boots of the winding path (prereq: level.name: Boots of the Winding Path
boots of the winding path (prereq: level.description:
The wearer can use a bonus action to teleport up to 15 ft to an unoccupied space it can see
   It must be a space that the wearer had occupied some time during the current turn

enhanced arcane focus.name: Enhanced Arcane Focus
enhanced arcane focus.description: The holder has a bonus to spell attack rolls and ignores half cover with spell attacks

homunculus servant.name: Homunculus Servant
homunculus servant.description:
The item I infuse becomes the heart of a homunculus that immediately forms around it
   I determine its appearance; It is friendly to me and my allies and obeys my commands
   See "Homunculus Servant" on a companion page to see its game statistics

creatureOptions.name: Homunculus Servant
creatureOptions.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

features.name: Creator
features.description: The homunculus obeys the commands of its creator and has the same proficiency bonus. It takes its turn immediately after its creator, on the same initiative count. It can move and take reactions on its own, but only takes the Dodge action on its turn unless its creator takes a bonus action to command it to take another action. If its creator is incapacitated, it can take any action, not just Dodge.

traits.name: Healing
traits.description: The homunculus regains 2d6 hit points whenever the Mending spell is cast on it. Its HP total is equal to 1 + its creator's artificer level + its creator's Intelligence modifier. If it or its creator dies, the homunculus vanishes, leaving its heart in its space.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.description: If the homunculus is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's incapacitated.

actions.name: Channel Magic
actions.description: As a reaction, the homunculus delivers a spell cast by its creator that has a range of touch. The homunculus must be within 120 ft of its creator to do so.

hp.body: function(e,a,t){var n,i;classes.known.artificer&&(n=Number(What("Int Mod")),i=classes.known.artificer.level,a.alt.push(1+n+i),a.altStr.push(" = 1 as a base\n + "+n+" from its creator's Intelligence modifier\n + "+i+" from its creator's artificer level"))}

radiant weapon (prereq: level 6 artifice.name: Radiant Weapon
radiant weapon (prereq: level 6 artifice.description:
The weapon has a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it and it sheds light
   As a bonus action, its wielder can start/stop the light, 30-ft radius bright + 30 ft dim light
   The weapon has 4 charges, regaining 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn
   As a reaction when hit by an attack, the wielder can expend 1 charge to blind its attacker
   The attacker makes a Con save (my spell save DC) or is blinded until its next turn ends

repeating shot.name: Repeating Shot
repeating shot.description:
The weapon requiring ammunition has a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it
   It magically produces one piece of ammunition whenever it is used to make a ranged attack
   Thus, it doesn't require ammunition and ignores the loading property if it has it

repulsion shield (prereq: level 6 artifi.name: Repulsion Shield
repulsion shield (prereq: level 6 artifi.description:
The shield gives its wearer an extra +1 bonus to AC; It has 4 charges, regaining 1d4 daily
   As a reaction when hit in melee, the wearer can use 1 charge to push the attacker 15 ft

resistant armor (prereq: level 6 artific.name: Resistant Armor
resistant armor (prereq: level 6 artific.description:
The armor gives its wearer resistance to one type of damage, chosen at the time of infusion
   Choose from: acid,	cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder

returning weapon.name: Returning Weapon
returning weapon.description: After being used for a ranged attack, the weapon returns immediately; +1 magical bonus

_optionalChoices.name: Arcane Propulsion Armor
_optionalChoices.description:
The armor replaces any missing limbs of the wearer and can't be removed against its will
   It increases the wearer's walking speed by 5 ft; Its gauntlet can be used as melee weapons

_optionalChoices.name: Armor of Magical Strength
_optionalChoices.description:
The armor has 6 charges, regaining 1d6 expended charges daily at dawn
   As a reaction when being knocked prone, the wearer can use 1 charge to not be prone
   When making a Str check/save, the wearer can use 1 charge to add its Int mod to the roll

_optionalChoices.name: Helm of Awareness
_optionalChoices.description: The wearer has advantage on Initiative rolls and can't be surprised while not incapacitated

_optionalChoices.name: Mind Sharpener
_optionalChoices.description: The wearer can use its reaction to ignore a failed Con save to maintain concentration

_optionalChoices.name: Spell-Refueling Ring
_optionalChoices.description: As an action once per dawn, this ring's wearer can recover one 3rd-level or lower spell slot

_optionalChoices._choiceName: Armor of Magical Strength (ua) (prereq: level 10 artificer)
_optionalChoices.name: Armor of Magical Strength
_optionalChoices.description:
The wearer of the armor can use its Int mod instead of its Str mod for Str checks/saves
   The armor has 4 charges, regaining 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn
   As a reaction when being knocked prone, the wearer can use 1 charge to not be prone

_optionalChoices.name: Armor of Tools
_optionalChoices.description:
The armor can have a set of artisan's or thieves' tools integrated into it as an action
   The tools remain integrated for 8 hours, or until removed as an action
   The wearer can add its Intelligence modifier to checks made with the integrated tools

_optionalChoices.name: Mind Sharpener
_optionalChoices.description: The wearer can use its reaction to ignore a failed Con save to maintain concentration

_optionalChoices.name: Spell-Refueling Ring
_optionalChoices.description:
As an action once per dawn, the wearer of this ring can recover one expended spell slot
   The maximum level of the spell slot is equal to the number of magic items it is attuned to

the right tool for the job.name: The Right Tool for the Job
the right tool for the job.description: In 1 hour (during a rest) I can create a set of artisan's tools that last until I do so again

subclassfeature3.name: Artificer Specialist
subclassfeature3.description:
Choose a specialism and put it in the "Class" field on the first page
   Choose either alchemist, artillerist, or battle smith

tool expertise.name: Tool Expertise
tool expertise.description: [expertise with all tools I'm proficient with]
tool expertise.skillstxt: Expertise with all tools I'm proficient with

flash of genius.name: Flash of Genius
flash of genius.description: As a reaction when I or another in 30 ft make a check/save, I can add my Int mod to it

magic item adept.name: Magic Item Adept
magic item adept.description: It takes me half the normal time and gold to craft common and uncommon magic items

spell-storing item.name: Spell-Storing Item
spell-storing item.description:
When I finish a long rest, I can infuse a 1st-/2nd-level artificer spell into an item I touch
   It has to be a weapon or spellcasting focus for me; Stored spells are lost if I do this again
   The spell must have a casting time of 1 action, but I need not have it prepared
   A creature holding an infused item can use an action to cast the spell, using my abilities

soul of artifice.name: Soul of Artifice
soul of artifice.description:
[+1 on all saves per attuned magic item]
   As a reaction when I'm reduced to 0 HP, I can end one infusion to drop to 1 HP instead

text: +1 to all saves per attuned magic item

skillstxt.primary: Choose any five skills

a sidekick.name: A Sidekick
a sidekick.description:
A sidekick can be any creature with challenge rating of 1/2 or lower
   The Spellcaster and Expert classes can only apply to creatures that can speak a language
   Fill out the stats block into the character sheet manually, the class adds to it
   The sidekick's level is the same as the average level of the group
   The hit dice of a sidekick are the same as those of the base creature, gaining +1 per level
   A sidekick does not get the benefits of a background, nor can it take feats or multiclass

bonus proficiencies: saving throws.name: Bonus Proficiencies: Saving Throws
bonus proficiencies: saving throws.description: Choose Dex, Int, or Cha save proficiency, using the "Choose Feature" button above

dexterity.name: Bonus Proficiencies: Dexterity Saving Throws
dexterity.description: I am proficient in Dexterity saving throws

intelligence.name: Bonus Proficiencies: Intelligence Saving Throws
intelligence.description: I am proficient in Intelligence saving throws

charisma.name: Bonus Proficiencies: Charisma Saving Throws
charisma.description: I am proficient in Charisma saving throws

bonus proficiencies.name: Bonus Proficiencies
bonus proficiencies.description:
I gain proficiency with light armor and in five skills of my choice
   If the base creature is a Humanoid or has a simple or martial weapon in its stat block,
   select it using the "Choose Feature" button above, so I gain more bonus proficiencies
choices: Base creature is a Humanoid or has a simple or martial weapon in its stat block

base creature is a humanoid or has a sim.name: Bonus Proficiencies: Humanoid
base creature is a humanoid or has a sim.description:
I gain proficiency with light armor and in five skills of my choice
   Additionally, I gain proficiency with two tools of my choice and with all simple weapons

other base creatures.name: Bonus Proficiencies: Non-humanoid
other base creatures.description: I gain proficiency with light armor and in five skills of my choice

helpful.name: Helpful
helpful.description: I can use a bonus action to take the Help action

cunning action.name: Cunning Action
cunning action.description: I can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action

expertise.name: Expertise
expertise.description:
I gain expertise with two skills I am proficient with
   At level 15th, I gain expertise with two more skills I am proficient with
expertise.skillstxt: Expertise with any two skill proficiencies, two more at level 15th

ability score improvement.name: Ability Score Improvement
ability score improvement.description:
Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1, up to a maximum of 20
   I gain this at 4th level and again at 8th, 10th, 12th, 16th, and 19th level

coordinated strike.name: Coordinated Strike
coordinated strike.description:
I can use Helpful to aid an ally to attack a creature up to 30 ft away from me
   If I do so, I add +2d6 damage on my next attack to that creature in the current turn

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description:
If an effect allows me to make a Dex save for half damage, I take no damage on a success
   Also, I only take half damage on a failed save; I can't do this while incapacitated

text: Dex save vs. area effects: fail ― half dmg, success ― no dmg

inspiring help.name: Inspiring Help
inspiring help.description:
When I use the Help action, the creature that receives the help adds +1d6 to its d20 roll
   If it was an attack roll that hits without the +1d6, it can add it to the damage instead
   At 20th level, this bonus increases to 2d6

reliable talent.name: Reliable Talent
reliable talent.description: If I make an ability check where I add my proficiency bonus, rolls of 9 or lower are 10

sharp mind.name: Sharp Mind
sharp mind.description: Choose Int, Wis, or Cha save proficiency, using the "Choose Feature" button above

intelligence.name: Sharp Mind: Intelligence
intelligence.description: I gain proficiency in Intelligence saving throws

wisdom.name: Sharp Mind: Wisdom
wisdom.description: I gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws

charisma.name: Sharp Mind: Charisma
charisma.description: I gain proficiency in Charisma saving throws

wisdom.description: I am proficient in Wisdom saving throws

charisma.name: Bonus Proficiencies: Charisma Saving Throws
charisma.description: I am proficient in Charisma saving throws

bonus proficiencies.name: Bonus Proficiencies
bonus proficiencies.description:
I gain proficiency with light armor and two skills of my choice from the following list:
   Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Medicine, Performance, Persuasion, and Religion
   If the base creature is a Humanoid or has a simple or martial weapon in its stat block,

base creature is a humanoid or has a sim.name: Bonus Proficiencies: Humanoid
base creature is a humanoid or has a sim.description:
I gain proficiency with light armor and two skills of my choice from the following list:
   Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Medicine, Performance, Persuasion, and Religion
   Additionally, I gain proficiency with all simple weapons

other base creatures.name: Bonus Proficiencies: Non-humanoid
other base creatures.description:
I gain proficiency with light armor and two skills of my choice from the following list:
   Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Medicine, Performance, Persuasion, and Religion

subclassfeature1.name: Spellcaster's Role
subclassfeature1.description: Choose the role of the sidekick, mage, healer, or prodigy, and put it in the "Class" field

ability score improvement.name: Ability Score Improvement
ability score improvement.description:
Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1, up to a maximum of 20
   I gain this at 4th level and again at 8th, 12th, 16th, and 18th level

potent cantrips.name: Potent Cantrips
potent cantrips.description: I add my spellcasting ability modifier to the damage I deal with any cantrip

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){var n=classes.known["sidekick-spellcaster-tcoe"].subclass;n&&ClassSubList[n].abilitySave&&0<(n=Number(What(AbilityScores.abbreviations[ClassSubList[n].abilitySave-1]+" Mod")))&&a.thisWeapon[3]&&0===SpellsList[a.thisWeapon[3]].level&&(t.extraDmg+=n)}

atkCalc: My cantrips get my spellcasting ability modifier added to their damage.

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){var n=classes.known["sidekick-spellcaster-tcoe"].subclass;if(n&&ClassSubList[n].abilitySave&&!a.psionic&&0===a.level){var n=AbilityScores.abbreviations[ClassSubList[n].abilitySave-1],i=Number(What(n+" Mod"));if(!(i<1))return genericSpellDmgEdit(e,a,"\\w+\\.?",n)}}

spellAdd: My cantrips get my spellcasting ability modifier added to their damage.

empowered spells.name: Empowered Spells
empowered spells.description:
Select one of the eight schools of magic using the "Choose Feature" button above
   Whenever I cast a spell from the selected school by expending a spell slot, I empower it
   I add my spellcasting ability modifier to the damage or healing I roll for that spell

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){var n=classes.known["sidekick-spellcaster-tcoe"].subclass,i=GetFeatureChoice("classes","sidekick-spellcaster-tcoe","empowered spells");if(n&&ClassSubList[n].abilitySave&&i&&!a.psionic&&a.level){for(var o in spellSchoolList)if(spellSchoolList[o]==i){i=o;break}if(a.school===i){n=AbilityScores.abbreviations[ClassSubList[n].abilitySave-1],n=Number(What(n+" Mod"));if(!(n<1))return!(!genericSpellDmgEdit(e,a,"\\w+\\.?",n,!0,!0)&&!genericSpellDmgEdit(e,a,"heal",n,!0,!0))||void 0}}}

spellAdd: Spells from my selected school cast by expending a spell slot get my spellcasting ability modifier added to their damage or healing rolls.

abjuration.name: Empowered Abjurations
abjuration.description:
Whenever I cast an abjuration spell by expending a spell slot, I can empower its effect
   I then add my spellcasting ability modifier to the damage or healing I roll for that spell

conjuration.name: Empowered Conjurations
conjuration.description:
Whenever I cast a conjuration spell by expending a spell slot, I can empower its effect
   I then add my spellcasting ability modifier to the damage or healing I roll for that spell

divination.name: Empowered Divinations
divination.description:
Whenever I cast a divination spell by expending a spell slot, I can empower its effect
   I then add my spellcasting ability modifier to the damage or healing I roll for that spell

enchantment.name: Empowered Enchantments
enchantment.description:
Whenever I cast a enchantment spell by expending a spell slot, I can empower its effect
   I then add my spellcasting ability modifier to the damage or healing I roll for that spell

evocation.name: Empowered Evocations
evocation.description:
Whenever I cast a evocation spell by expending a spell slot, I can empower its effect
   I then add my spellcasting ability modifier to the damage or healing I roll for that spell

illusion.name: Empowered Illusions
illusion.description:
Whenever I cast an illusion spell by expending a spell slot, I can empower its effect
   I then add my spellcasting ability modifier to the damage or healing I roll for that spell

necromancy.name: Empowered Necromancy
necromancy.description:
Whenever I cast a necromancy spell by expending a spell slot, I can empower its effect
   I then add my spellcasting ability modifier to the damage or healing I roll for that spell

transmutation.name: Empowered Transmutations
transmutation.description:
Whenever I cast a transmutation spell by expending a spell slot, I can empower its effect
   I then add my spellcasting ability modifier to the damage or healing I roll for that spell

focused casting.name: Focused Casting
focused casting.description: Taking damage can't break my concentration on a spell

martial role.name: Martial Role
martial role.description: Choose a Martial Role for the warrior using the "Choose Feature" button above

attacker.name: Martial Role: Attacker
attacker.description: I gain a +2 bonus to all my attack rolls

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){a.isDC||(t.extraHit+=2)}

atkCalc: I add a +2 bonus on the To Hit of all my attack rolls.

defender.name: Martial Role: Defender
defender.description:
As a reaction, I can give disadv. on an attack made vs. someone within 5 ft of me
   I need to be able to see the attacker to do this

second wind.name: Second Wind
second wind.description:
As a bonus action, I can regain hit points equal to 1d10 + warrior level
   I can use this once per short rest (twice at 20th-level)

improved critical.name: Improved Critical
improved critical.description: I score a critical hit with my weapon attacks on a roll of 19 and 20

atkAdd.body: function(e,a){a.isDC||a.isSpell||a.CritChance||!classes.known["sidekick-warrior"]||(e.Description+=(e.Description?"; ":"")+"Crit on 19-20",a.CritChance=19)}

atkAdd: My weapon attacks score a critical on a to hit roll of both 19 and 20.

ability score improvement.name: Ability Score Improvement
ability score improvement.description:
Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1, up to a maximum of 20
   I gain this at 4th level and again at 8th, 12th, 14th, 16th, and 19th level

extra attack.name: Extra Attack
extra attack.description:
I can attack twice, instead of once, whenever I take the Attack action on my turn
   This increases to three at 15th level
   If I have the Multiattack action, I can use either that or extra attack on a turn, not both
additional: 1 attacks as an action on my turn
1 attacks as an action on my turn
1 attacks as an action on my turn
1 attacks as an action on my turn
1 attacks as an action on my turn
1 attacks as an action on my turn
1 attacks as an action on my turn
1 attacks as an action on my turn
1 attacks as an action on my turn
3 attacks as an action on my turn
3 attacks as an action on my turn
3 attacks as an action on my turn
3 attacks as an action on my turn
3 attacks as an action on my turn
3 attacks as an action on my turn

battle readiness.name: Battle Readiness
battle readiness.description: I have advantage on my Initiative rolls

improved defense.name: Improved Defense
improved defense.description: I gain a +1 bonus to AC

indomitable.name: Indomitable
indomitable.description:
I can reroll a failed saving throw, but must keep the new result
   I can use this once per long rest (twice at 20th-level)

name: Spell-less Ranger

skillstxt.primary: Choose three from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival
skillstxt.secondary: Choose one from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival

favored enemy.name: Favored Enemy
favored enemy.description:
Use the "Choose Feature" button above to add a favored enemy to the third page
   When selecting a favored enemy, I also learn one of the languages it speaks
   I have adv. on Wis (Survival) checks to track and Int checks to recall info about them

natural explorer.name: Natural Explorer
natural explorer.description: Use the "Choose Feature" button above to add a favored terrain to the third page

travel benefits.name: Favored Terrain Travel Benefits
travel benefits.description:
I can double my Proficiency Bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning my favored terrains
   While traveling for an hour or more in a favored terrain, I gain the following benefits:
    • My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic
    • I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food
    • If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace
    • When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

combat superiority.name: Combat Superiority
combat superiority.description:
I gain a number of superiority dice that I can use to fuel special Maneuvers
   I regain all superiority dice after a short rest

combat maneuvers.name: Combat Maneuvers
combat maneuvers.description:
Use the "Choose Feature" button above to add a Maneuver to the third page
   I can use a Maneuver by expending a superiority die (only one Maneuver per attack)

commander's strike.name: Commander's Strike
commander's strike.description:
I forgo one attack of my Attack action to use a bonus action to direct an ally I see/hear
   The ally can use a reaction to make an attack, adding the superiority die to damage

disarming attack.name: Disarming Attack
disarming attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
   Target makes a Strength save or drops a held object of my choice to its feet

distracting strike.name: Distracting Strike
distracting strike.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
   The next attack of an ally before my next turn has adv. against the creature

evasive footwork.name: Evasive Footwork
evasive footwork.description: Use when moving; I add the superiority die to my AC until I stop moving

feinting attack.name: Feinting Attack
feinting attack.description:
As a bonus action, I can feint to gain adv. on my next attack against a target within 5 ft
   If the attack hits, I add the superiority die to my attack's damage

goading attack.name: Goading Attack
goading attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
   Target makes a Wis save or has disadv. vs. other targets until the end of my next turn

lunging attack.name: Lunging Attack
lunging attack.description:
I can spend a superiority die to increase the reach of a melee weapon attack by 5 ft
   If the attack hits, I add the superiority die to my attack's damage

maneuvering attack.name: Maneuvering Attack
maneuvering attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
   Ally can use reaction to move half speed without opportunity attack from the target

menacing attack.name: Menacing Attack
menacing attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
   Target makes a Wisdom save or is frightened of me until the end of my next turn

parry.name: Parry
parry.description: When damaged in melee, I can use a reaction to reduce it by superiority die + Dex mod

precision attack.name: Precision Attack
precision attack.description: I add the superiority die to my attack roll, either before or after rolling

pushing attack.name: Pushing Attack
pushing attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to the attack's damage
   If target is Large or smaller, it must make a Strength save or be pushed up to 15 ft away

rally.name: Rally
rally.description: Ally that can see/hear me gets temporary HP equal to superiority die + Charisma mod

riposte.name: Riposte
riposte.description:
When missed in melee, I can use my reaction to make one melee attack vs. the attacker
   If the attack hits, I add the superiority die to my attack's damage

sweeping attack.name: Sweeping Attack
sweeping attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature and a second creature is within 5 ft of the first
   If the original attack roll hits this second creature, it takes the superiority die in damage

trip attack.name: Trip Attack
trip attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to the attack's damage
   If target is Large or smaller, it must make a Strength save or be knocked prone

fighting style.name: Fighting Style
fighting style.description: Choose a Fighting Style for the ranger using the "Choose Feature" button above

archery.name: Archery Fighting Style
archery.description: +2 bonus to attack rolls I make with ranged weapons

atkCalc: My ranged weapons get a +2 bonus on the To Hit.

defense.name: Defense Fighting Style
defense.description: +1 bonus to AC when I'm wearing armor

extraAC.name: Defense Fighting Style
extraAC.text: I gain a +1 bonus to AC while wearing armor.

dueling.name: Dueling Fighting Style
dueling.description: +2 to damage rolls when wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons

atkCalc: When I'm wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no weapon in my other hand, I do +2 damage with that melee weapon. This condition will always be false if the bonus action 'Off-hand Attack' exists.

two-weapon fighting.name: Two-Weapon Fighting Style
two-weapon fighting.description: I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks

atkCalc: When engaging in two-weapon fighting, I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks. If a melee weapon includes 'off-hand' or 'secondary' in its name or description, it is considered an off-hand attack.

poultices.name: Poultices
poultices.description:
In 1 hour, I can create a number of poultices equal to my Wisdom modifier (min 1)
   The number of poultices I can have with me can't exceed my Wisdom modifier (min 1)
   I can applying a poultice in 1 minute, healing a creature; Poultices last for 24 hours

primeval awareness.name: Primeval Awareness
primeval awareness.description:
As an action, I can focus my awareness for 1 min, once per short rest
   Out to 1 mile (6 in favored terrain), I sense if certain types of creatures are present
   These types are: aberration, celestial, dragon, elemental, fey, fiend, and undead

subclassfeature3.name: Ranger Archetype
subclassfeature3.description:
Choose a Ranger Archetype you strive to emulate and put it in the "Class" field
   Choose either Spell-less Beast Master or Spell-less Hunter

land's stride.name: Land's Stride
land's stride.description:
I can travel through nonmagical, difficult terrain without penalty
   I have advantage on saves vs. plants that impede movement by magical influence

natural antivenom.name: Natural Antivenom
natural antivenom.description:
I have advantage on saves vs. poison and resistance to poison damage
   When I use a poultice, in addition to healing, I cure one poison effect on the creature

hide in plain sight.name: Land's Stride
hide in plain sight.description:
I can travel through nonmagical, difficult terrain without penalty
   I have advantage on saves vs. plants that impede movement by magical influence

call natural allies.name: Call Natural Allies
call natural allies.description:
While in an area that is my Favored Terrain, I can call on beasts within 1 mile to help
   The DM determines the beasts: 1×CR 2, 2×CR 1, 4×CR 1/2, or 8×CR 1/4
   They will fight alongside me, are friendly to me and my allies, and help up to 1 hour
   After I use these feature, I can't use it in the same general area again for 24 hours

vanish.name: Vanish
vanish.description: I can't be nonmagically tracked if I don't want to be and can Hide as a bonus action

relentless.name: Relentless
relentless.description: I regain one superiority die if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

feral senses.name: Feral Senses
feral senses.description:
When not blinded or deafened, I'm aware of invisible, non-hidden creatures in 30 ft
   I don't have disadvantage when attacking creatures I am aware of but can't see

foe slayer.name: Foe Slayer
foe slayer.description: Once per turn, I can add my Wis mod to the attack or damage roll vs. a favored enemy

name: Playtest Ranger

skillstxt.primary: Choose three from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival
skillstxt.secondary: Choose one from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival

ambuscade.name: Ambuscade
ambuscade.description:
When I roll initiative, I gain a special turn before others can act
   During this bonus turn, I can only use the Attack or Hide action
   I can't be surprised, but if I would be surprised I don't get the bonus turn

natural explorer.name: Natural Explorer
natural explorer.description: Use the "Choose Feature" button above to add a favored terrain to the third page

travel benefits.name: Favored Terrain Travel Benefits
travel benefits.description:
I can double my Proficiency Bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning my favored terrains
   While traveling for an hour or more in a favored terrain, I gain the following benefits:
    • My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic
    • I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food
    • If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace
    • When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

fighting style.name: Fighting Style
fighting style.description: Choose a Fighting Style for the ranger using the "Choose Feature" button above

archery.name: Archery Fighting Style
archery.description: +2 bonus to attack rolls I make with ranged weapons

atkCalc: My ranged weapons get a +2 bonus on the To Hit.

defense.name: Defense Fighting Style
defense.description: +1 bonus to AC when I'm wearing armor

extraAC.name: Defense Fighting Style
extraAC.text: I gain a +1 bonus to AC while wearing armor.

dueling.name: Dueling Fighting Style
dueling.description: +2 to damage rolls when wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons

atkCalc: When I'm wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no weapon in my other hand, I do +2 damage with that melee weapon. This condition will always be false if the bonus action 'Off-hand Attack' exists.

two-weapon fighting.name: Two-Weapon Fighting Style
two-weapon fighting.description: I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks

atkCalc: When engaging in two-weapon fighting, I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks. If a melee weapon includes 'off-hand' or 'secondary' in its name or description, it is considered an off-hand attack.

skirmisher's stealth.name: Skirmisher's Stealth
skirmisher's stealth.description:
At the start of my turn, I can choose a creature I'm hidden from
   During that turn, I remain hidden from it, regardless of my actions
   As a bonus action at the end of my turn, I can use the Hide action

subclassfeature3.name: Ranger Path
subclassfeature3.description:
Choose a Ranger Path you wish to follow and put it in the "Class" field
   Choose Guardian, Seeker, or Stalker

primeval awareness.name: Primeval Awareness
primeval awareness.description:
As an action, I can use a spell slot to focus my awareness for 1 min per spell slot level
   Out to 1 mile (6 in favored terrain), I sense if certain types of creatures are present

name: Rune Scribe

rune lore.name: Rune Lore
rune lore.description:
I learn the basics of scribing runes, and can activate all properties of a master rune
   The first rune I master is the one I found to qualify to become a rune scribe
   To use any features of a master rune, I need to first attune to it just like a magic item
   Use the "Choose Feature" button above to add master runes to the third page

opal of the ild rune.name: Opal of the Ild Rune
opal of the ild rune.description:
[rare, requires attunement]- Ignite (simple): As an action, ignite touched flammable object; Fire extends 1 ft from it
   - Fire Tamer (simple): As an action, extinguish touched open flame up to 10-ft radius
      I can expend a spell slot to extend that radius by 20 ft/SL
   - Fire's Friend (simple): While attuned, I have resistance to cold damage
   - Combustion (complex): As an action, I expend spell slot and touch a creature
      The target automatically takes 1d10 + 1d10/SL fire damage
   - Flame Brand (complex): During a short rest, I can augment a weapon, or 20 ammo
      The weapon or ammo deals fire damage; It lasts for 24 hours or until I use this again
      I can expend a spell slot to also give the weapon a magic bonus of slot level dived by 3
   - Flame Stoker (complex): While attuned, I roll any fire damage twice and use the higher

orb of the stein rune.name: Orb of the Stein Rune
orb of the stein rune.description:
[rare, requires attunement]- Indomitable Stand (simple): As an action, I gain abilities until I move
      I have advantage on all ability checks and saving throws to resist being moved
      Anyone moving within 10 ft makes a DC 12 Str save or has speed 0 until its next turn
   - Stone Soul (simple): While attuned, I cannot be petrified
   - Stone's Secrets (simple): As an action, I learn everybody's current location within 30 ft
      They have to touch the same surface as I'm touching with my hand
   - Crushing Brand (complex): During a short rest, I can augment a bludgeoning weapon
      The weapon's bludgeoning damage ignores resistances and immunities
      If the weapon deals its maximum damage, the target is also knocked prone
      I can expend a spell slot to also give the weapon a magic bonus of slot level dived by 3
      These effects last for 24 hours or until I use Crushing Brand again
   - Earthen Step (complex): I can cast Meld Into Stone as a bonus action once per short rest
   - Overwhelming Bolt (complex): As an action, I expend spell slot and touch a creature
      It takes 2d8+1d8/SL bludg. dmg and is prone; DC 12+SL Str save for half & not prone

levitate.changes: Using my Orb of the Stein Rune, I can cast Meld Into Stone as a bonus action once per short rest.

extraLimitedFeatures.name: Earthen Step (Orb of the Stein Rune)

pennant of the vind rune.name: Pennant of the Vind Rune
pennant of the vind rune.description:
[rare, requires attunement]- Comforting Wind (simple): While attuned, I can't suffocate or drown
      Also, I gain advantage on saves against inhaled poisons, toxins, and similar effects
   - Wind Step (simple): As an action, I fly 20 ft, after which I fall if I'm still airborne
   - Wind's Grasp (simple): As a reaction when falling, I can take no damage from the fall
   - Howling Brand (complex): During a short rest, I can augment a ranged weapon
      Its range is doubled and attacks with it do not suffer disadvantage due to range
      I can expend a spell slot to also give the weapon a magic bonus of slot level dived by 3
      These effects last for 24 hours or until I use Howling Brand again
   - Shrieking Bolt (complex): As an action, I expend spell slot to target a creature I can see
      It 2d8+1d8/SL bludg. dmg & pushed 10 ft; DC 12+SL Str save for half & not pushed
   - Wind Walker (complex): I can cast Levitate as a bonus action once per short rest

levitate.changes: Using my Pennant of the Vind Rune, I can cast Levitate as a bonus action once per short rest.

extraLimitedFeatures.name: Wind Walker (Pennant of the Vind Rune)

shard of the kalt rune.name: Shard of the Kalt Rune
shard of the kalt rune.description:
[rare, requires attunement]- Frigid Touch (simple): As an action, I freeze water that I touch a 10-ft radius
   - Frost Friend (simple): While attuned, I have resistance to fire damage
   - Icy Mantle (simple): As an action, me or a creature I touch gains a protective mantle
      The next time taking bludg., slash., pierc. damage, it absorbs the damage and falls apart
   - Freezing Bolt (complex): As an action, I expend spell slot and touch a creature
      It takes 2d8+1d8/SL cold damage and its speed is 0 until the end of my next turn
      If it succeeds on a DC 12+SL Con save, it takes only half damage and has normal speed
   - Ice Brand (complex): During a short rest, I can augment a weapon, or 20 ammo pieces
      The weapon or ammo deals cold damage; It lasts for 24 hours or until I use this again
      I can expend a spell slot to also give the weapon a magic bonus of slot level dived by 3
   - Winter's Howl (complex): I can cast Sleet Storm as an action once per short rest

extraLimitedFeatures.name: Winter's Howl (Shard of the Kalt Rune)

runic magic.name: Runic Magic
runic magic.description: I obtain spell slots as if gaining a level in a full spellcasting class, but don't learn spells

runic discovery.name: Runic Discovery
runic discovery.description:
I know a number of master runes which I can attune to, even if not in my possession
   Attuning or de-attuning in this manner can be done over the course of a short rest

living rune.name: Living Rune
living rune.description:
I get 2 points that I can add to one or two of my ability scores as I see fit
   When I finish a long rest, I can re-allocate these point(s) from a single score to another

rune mastery.name: Rune Mastery
rune mastery.description: One rune I'm attuned to doesn't count toward the limit of magic items I can attune to

name: Ranger

skillstxt.primary: Choose three from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival
skillstxt.secondary: Choose one from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, or Survival

subclassfeature3.name: Slayer's Mysticism
subclassfeature3.description: I get bonus spells known, which do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.1.name: Slayer's Eye
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can study a creature within 120 ft that I can see
   I learn its vulnerabilities, immunities, resistances, and the effects damaging it can have
   My first weapon hit on it each turn does +1d6 damage, until I study another or rest

subclassfeature7.name: Supernatural Defense
subclassfeature7.description: I add 1d6 to saves I make against abilities of the current target of my Slayer's Eye

subclassfeature11.name: Relentless Slayer
subclassfeature11.description:
As a reaction, I can stop the target of my Slayer's Eye from escaping, if within 30 ft
   If I win a contested Wis check, it wastes it action to teleport/transform/plane shift

subclassfeature15.name: Slayer's Counter
subclassfeature15.description:
As a reaction when the target of my Slayer's Eye has me make a save, I can attack it
   I can make one weapon attack; If this hits, I automatically succeed on the saving throw

subclassfeature3.name: Swarmkeeper Magic
subclassfeature3.description:
I learn Mage Hand; When I cast it, the hand takes the form of swarming nature spirits
   I get bonus spells known, which do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.1.name: Gathered Swarm
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I constantly have a swarm of fey spirits crawling in my space, they look like Tiny beasts
   As a bonus action, I can agitate that swarm for 1 minute, empowering my attacks
   Once per turn when I hit with a weapon attack, I can have it deal extra force damage
   In addition, the creature hit is moved 5 ft towards or away from me (my choice)

subclassfeature7.name: Writhing Tide
subclassfeature7.description:
Whenever I activate Gathered Swarm, I gain one additional benefit of my choice:
    • I gain +10 ft walking speed and I can take the Disengage action as a bonus action
    • I gain climb speed equal to walk speed & need no check for difficult surfaces or ceilings
    • I gain a 10 ft fly speed and I can hover

scuttling eyes.name: Scuttling Eyes
scuttling eyes.description:
As an action, I can from a spirit of my swarm into a Tiny beast of my choice for 1 hour
   It has AC 18, my senses, and 40 ft speed it can use to walk, climb, fly, or swim
   It telepathically relays what it sees and hears to me and I can speak through it
   During my turn, I can telepathically command it and it can hide using my Stealth
   If it is damaged, I must make a Wis save (DC 10 or half damage if higher) or it vanishes
   As an action, I can dismiss it early and I can teleport to an empty space within 5 ft of it
   I can also invoke this ability by spending a spell slot of 3rd level or higher

storm of minions.name: Storm of Minions
storm of minions.description:
As an action, I can create a 10-ft radius swarm-filled sphere on a point within 120 ft
   I can choose any number of creatures that I can see to be unaffected by it
   It lasts minute, is difficult terrain for others, and I can move it 30 ft as a bonus action
   Others that start their turn in it take 2d8 necrotic damage and must make a Con save
   On a success, they take half damage, but if failed, are blinded until their next turn starts
   At the start of my turn, if a Small or larger creature was damaged by it, I heal 1d8 HP
   I can also invoke this ability by spending a spell slot of 4th level or higher

subclassfeature3.name: Fey Wanderer Magic
subclassfeature3.description: I get bonus spells known, which do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.1.name: Cunning Will
subclassfeature3.1.description: Adv. on saves vs. charm/frightened; Proficiency in Deception, Performance, or Persuasion
subclassfeature3.1.skillstxt: Choose one from: Deception, Performance, or Persuasion

subclassfeature3.2.name: Dreadful Strikes
subclassfeature3.2.description:
As a bonus action, I can imbue the weapons I'm holding with magic until my turn ends
   They count as magical and deal +1d6 psychic damage, but only once to a single creature
   I can also do this as part of the same bonus action as making an off-hand attack

subclassfeature7.name: Blessings of the Courts
subclassfeature7.description:
Once per turn when I hit a weapon attack, I can expend a spell slot for extra damage
   The target takes +3d6 psychic damage and must make a Wis save or be frightened of me
   This lasts until the end of my next turn; In addition, I add my Wis mod to Cha checks

addMod.text: I add my Wisdom modifier to my Charisma checks
I add my Wisdom modifier to my Charisma checks
I add my Wisdom modifier to my Charisma checks
I add my Wisdom modifier to my Charisma checks

subclassfeature11.name: Beguiling Twist
subclassfeature11.description:
As a reaction when a creature I can see in 120 ft succeeds a save vs. charmed/frightened
   I can have another I can see in 120 ft make a Wis save or suffer one effect of my choice:
    • For 1 min, it's frightened of me or charmed; It can save again at the end of its turns
    • It takes 3d10 psychic damage

misty presence.name: Misty Presence
misty presence.description:
As a bonus action, I can have a creature I can see within 30 ft make a Wisdom save
   On a failed save, it cannot see or hear me for 24 hours or until I use this feature again
   The target can repeat its save if I hit it with an attack, force it to save, or deal it damage
   On a successful save, the creature is immune to my use of this feature for 7 days
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending a 4th-level or higher spell slot (SS 4+)

subclassfeature3.name: Draconic Gift
subclassfeature3.description: I learn the Draconic language and the Thaumaturgy cantrip

subclassfeature3.1.name: Drake Companion
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As an action, I can summon my drake to an empty space within 30 ft that I can see
   Select a "Drake Companion" on the companion page for its stats and rules
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending a 1st-level or higher spell slot (SS 1+)

creatureOptions.name: Drake Companion
creatureOptions.damage_immunities: the chosen Draconic Essence damage type

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.description: Only 1d6 is piercing damage, the rest is of the chosen Draconic Essence damage type

features.name: Warden
features.description: The drake obeys the commands of its warden and shares its proficiency bonus. It takes its turn immediately after that of its warden, on the same initiative. It can move and take reactions on its own, but only takes the Dodge action on its turn unless its warden takes a bonus action to command it to take another action. If its warden is incapacitated, the drake can take any action, not just Dodge. The drake vanishes after a number of hours equal to its proficiency bonus, when it is reduced to 0 hit points, when its warden summons another drake, or when its warden dies.

traits.name: Draconic Essence
traits.description: When the drake is summoned, choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison.

traits.name: Infused Strikes
traits.description: As a reaction when another creature within 30 ft of the drake that it can see hits with a weapon attack, the drake can infuse the strike with its essence, causing the attack to deal an extra 1d6 damage of its chosen Draconic Essence damage type

traits.name: Bond of Fang and Scale (Drakewarden 7)
traits.description: When the drake is summoned, it gains either a 40 ft swimming speed and can breathe underwater, or a 40 ft flying speed and has wings. The drake's bite deals an extra 1d6 damage of its chosen Draconic Essence type.

addMod.text: The drake's bite attack deals an extra 1d6 damage of the type chosen for its Draconic Essence.

traits.name: Perfected Bond (Drakewarden 15)
traits.description: The drake's size is now Large and its bite attack deals an extra 1d6 damage (for a total of +2d6) of its chosen Draconic Essence type.

addMod.text: The drake's bite attack deals another extra 1d6 damage (for a total of +2d6) of the type chosen for its Draconic Essence.

hp.body: function(e,a,t){var n,i;(classes.known.ranger||classes.known.rangerua)&&(n=(classes.known.ranger||classes.known.rangerua).level,a.alt.push(5+(i=5*n)),a.altStr.push(" = 5 as a base\n + 5 × "+n+" from five times its warden's ranger level ("+i+")"))}

subclassfeature7.name: Bond of Fang and Scale
subclassfeature7.description:
When I summon my drake I can choose for it to have 40 ft flying or swimming speed
   If I choose swimming, it also gains the ability to breathe underwater
   The drake's bite attack deals an extra 1d6 damage chosen by its Draconic Essense
   While it is summoned, I gain resistance to the damage type of its Draconic Essense

subclassfeature11.name: Drake's Breath
subclassfeature11.description:
As an action, I can cause my drake or myself to exhale a 30-ft cone breath weapon
   Its damage type is acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison; Dex save to halve the damage
   I can do this once per long rest, or by expending a 3rd-level or higher spell slot (SS 3+)

weaponOptions.name: Drake's Breath
weaponOptions.description: Hits all in area; Dex save for half damage; Damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison

atkAdd.body: function(e,a){a.theWea.DrakewardenDrakeBreath&&(classes.known.rangerua||classes.known.ranger)&&(a=(classes.known.ranger||classes.known.rangerua).level,e.Damage_Die=(a<15?6:8)+"d6")}

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){a.theWea.DrakewardenDrakeBreath&&classes.known.rangerua&&(a.theWea.useSpellMod="rangerua")}

subclassfeature15.name: Perfected Bond
subclassfeature15.description:
My drake is now Large and its bite deals +1d6 damage chosen by its Draconic Essence
   As a reaction when the drake or I take damage while within 30 ft of each other,
   I can give myself or the drake resistance to that instance of damage

subclassfeature3.name: Dread Ambusher
subclassfeature3.description:
I can add my Wisdom modifier to my initiative rolls
   In the first turn of combat I get +10 ft speed and an extra attack with the Attack action
   If I take the Attack action and that extra attack hits, it does +1d8 damage

addMod.text: I can add my Wisdom modifier to my initiative rolls.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Gloom Stalker Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I add a spell to my known spells at level 3, 5, 9, 13, and 17
   These count as ranger spells, but do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.2.name: Umbral Sight
subclassfeature3.2.description:
I gain 60 ft darkvision, or add 30 ft to darkvision if I already had it because of my race
   When I'm in darkness, others gain no benefit from darkvision to detect me

subclassfeature7.name: Iron Mind
subclassfeature7.description: I gain proficiency with Wis saves, or if I'm already proficient, either Int or Cha saves

subclassfeature11.name: Stalker's Flurry
subclassfeature11.description: Once on each of my turns when I miss a weapon attack, I can make an extra attack

subclassfeature15.name: Shadowy Dodge
subclassfeature15.description: As a reaction when I'm attacked without adv., I can impose disadv. on the attack roll

subclassfeature3.name: Detect Portal
subclassfeature3.description: As an action, I sense the distance and direction to the closest planar portal within 1 mile

subclassfeature3.1.name: Horizon Walker Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I add a spell to my known spells at level 3, 5, 9, 13, and 17
   These count as ranger spells, but do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.2.name: Planar Warrior
subclassfeature3.2.description:
As a bonus action, I choose one creature that I can see within 30 ft of me
   All damage from my first weapon attack that hits it on this turn becomes force damage
   In addition, that first hit does extra damage

subclassfeature7.name: Ethereal Step
subclassfeature7.description: As a bonus action, I can cast the Etherealness spell, which lasts until the end of my turn

etherealness.description: I go to Ethereal Plane; move there, but able to perceive 60 ft into the normal plane
etherealness.changes: Using my Ethereal Step class feature I can cast Etherealness as a bonus action once per short rest, but it only affects myself and lasts until the end of my turn.

subclassfeature11.name: Distant Strike
subclassfeature11.description:
With the Attack action, I can teleport 10 ft before each attack, to a place I can see
   If I attack two different creatures with this action, I get an extra attack against a third

subclassfeature15.name: Spectral Defense
subclassfeature15.description: As a reaction when an attack damages me, I can give myself resistance vs. that attack

subclassfeature3.name: Hunter's Sense
subclassfeature3.description:
As an action, I learn vulnerabilities/immunities/resistances of a target I see within 60 ft
   If it is protected from divination magic, I sense it has none of these

subclassfeature3.1.name: Monster Slayer Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description: I get bonus spells known, which do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.2.name: Slayer's Prey
subclassfeature3.2.description:
As a bonus action, I designate a creature I see within 60 ft; This lasts until I do this again
   My first hit to the target with a weapon attack on each of my turns does +1d6 damage

subclassfeature7.name: Supernatural Defense
subclassfeature7.description:
I add 1d6 to saving throws the current target of my Slayer's Prey forces me to make
   In addition, I also add 1d6 to checks to escape that target's grapple

subclassfeature11.name: Magic-User's Nemesis
subclassfeature11.description:
As a reaction when I see someone within 60 ft casting a spell or teleporting, I can foil it
   The target must make a Wisdom save or have its spell or teleport fail and be wasted

subclassfeature15.name: Slayer's Counter
subclassfeature15.description:
As a reaction when the target of my Slayer's Prey has me make a save, I can attack it
   I can make one weapon attack; If this hits, I automatically succeed on the saving throw

favored enemy.name: Favored Enemy
favored enemy.description:
Use the "Choose Feature" button above to select a favored enemy
   Choose from beasts, fey, humanoids, monstrosities, or undead
   I get a bonus to damage rolls with weapon attacks against the chosen favored enemy
   I have adv. on Wis (Survival) to track and Int checks to recall info about them
   I also learn one language of my choice, typically one associated with the favored enemy

beasts.name: Favored Enemy: Beasts
beasts.description:
I get a bonus to damage rolls with weapon attacks against beasts
   I have adv. on Wis (Survival) to track and Int checks to recall info about beasts
   I learn a language, typically one spoken by or associated with beasts

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){!a.isSpell&&classes.known.rangerua&&classes.known.rangerua.level&&/favou?red.{1,2}enemy/i.test(a.WeaponTextName)&&(t.extraDmg+=classes.known.rangerua.level<6?2:4)}

atkCalc: If I include the words 'Favored Enemy' in the name or description of a weapon, it gets bonus damage, depending on my Ranger level.

fey.name: Favored Enemy: Fey
fey.description:
I get a bonus to damage rolls with weapon attacks against fey
   I have adv. on Wis (Survival) to track and Int checks to recall info about fey
   I learn a language, typically one spoken by or associated with fey

   I have adv. on Wis (Survival) to track and Int checks to recall info about humanoids
   I learn a language, typically one spoken by or associated with humanoids

monstrosities.description:
I get a bonus to damage rolls with weapon attacks against monstrosities
   I have adv. on Wis (Survival) to track and Int checks to recall info about monstrosities
   I learn a language, typically one spoken by or associated with monstrosities

undead.description:
I get a bonus to damage rolls with weapon attacks against undead
   I have adv. on Wis (Survival) to track and Int checks to recall info about undead
   I learn a language, typically one spoken by or associated with undead

atkCalc: If I include the words 'Favored Enemy' in the name or description of a weapon, it gets bonus damage, depending on my Ranger level.

_optionalChoices.name: Favored Foe
_optionalChoices.description:
I know Hunter's Mark and it doesn't count against the number of spells I can know
   I can cast it a number of times without using a spell slot or requiring concentration
   I can also use a spell slot to cast it as normal, but then it does require concentration

natural explorer.name: Natural Explorer
natural explorer.description:
On my first turn in combat, I have adv. on attacks against those that did not yet act
   I ignore difficult terrain; I have adv. on Initiative; I have benefits in travel, see page 3

travel benefits.name: Travel Benefits
travel benefits.description:
After one hour of traveling in the wilderness I gain the following benefits:
    • My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic
    • I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food
    • If alone (or alone with animal companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace
    • When tracking others, I also learn their exact number, size, and time since passing

fighting style.name: Fighting Style
fighting style.description: Choose a Fighting Style for the ranger using the "Choose Feature" button above

archery.name: Archery Fighting Style
archery.description: +2 bonus to attack rolls I make with ranged weapons

atkCalc: My ranged weapons get a +2 bonus on the To Hit.

defense.name: Defense Fighting Style
defense.description: +1 bonus to AC when I'm wearing armor

extraAC.name: Defense Fighting Style
extraAC.text: I gain a +1 bonus to AC while wearing armor.

dueling.name: Dueling Fighting Style
dueling.description: +2 to damage rolls when wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons

atkCalc: When I'm wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no weapon in my other hand, I do +2 damage with that melee weapon. This condition will always be false if the bonus action 'Off-hand Attack' exists.

two-weapon fighting.name: Two-Weapon Fighting Style
two-weapon fighting.description: I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks

atkCalc: When engaging in two-weapon fighting, I can add my ability modifier to the damage of my off-hand attacks. If a melee weapon includes 'off-hand' or 'secondary' in its name or description, it is considered an off-hand attack.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
spellcasting.description: I can cast ranger spells that I know, using Wisdom as my spellcasting ability

_optionalChoices.name: Martial Versatility
_optionalChoices.description: Whenever I gain a ranger level, I can swap a fighting style I know for another I'm allowed

spellList.body: function(e,a,t){"ranger"!==a&&"rangerua"!==a||-1!==t.indexOf("bonus")||(e.extraspells=e.extraspells.concat(["entangle","searing smite","aid","enhance ability","gust of wind","magic weapon","warding bond","blinding smite","meld into stone","revivify","tongues","death ward","dominate beast","awaken","greater restoration"]))}

spellList: This alternative class feature enhancement expands the spell list of the ranger class with the following spells (spell level in brackets): Entangle (1), Searing Smite (1), Aid (2), Enhance Ability (2), Gust of Wind (2), Magic Weapon (2), Warding Bond (2), Blinding Smite (3), Meld into Stone (3), Revivify (3), Tongues (3), Death Ward (4), Dominate Beast (4), Awaken (5), and Greater Restoration (5).

_optionalChoices.name: Spell Versatility
_optionalChoices.description: When I finish a long rest, I can replace a ranger spell I know with another of the same level

_optionalChoices.name: Dunamancy Spells
_optionalChoices.description: All dunamancy spells are added to the ranger spell list, each still pending DM's approval

spellList: This optional class feature expands the spell list of the ranger class with all dunamancy spells (spell level in brackets): Gift of Alacrity (1), Magnify Gravity (1), Fortune's Favor (2), Immovable Object (2), Wristpocket (2), Pulse Wave (3), Gravity Sinkhole (4), and Temporal Shunt (5).

primeval awareness.name: Primeval Awareness
primeval awareness.description:
If I haven't attacked a beast within the last 10 min, I can communicate with it
   As an action, I convey simple ideas, and read mood, intent, emotions, needs, etc.
   By concentrating for 1 min, I know if any of my favored enemies are within 5 miles
   Per group, I sense the number, general direction, distance, and type of favored enemy

subclassfeature3.name: Ranger Conclave
subclassfeature3.description:
Choose a Ranger Conclave you strive to emulate and put it in the "Class" field
   Choose either Beast Conclave, Deep Stalker Conclave or Hunter Conclave

greater favored enemy.name: Greater Favored Enemy
greater favored enemy.description:
Use the "Choose Feature" button above to select a greater favored enemy
   Choose from aberrations, celestials, constructs, dragons, elementals, fiends, or giants
   I get all the bonuses from Favored Enemy for this creature type as well
   Additionally, I have adv. on saves vs. spells and abilities of this greater favored enemy

aberrations.name: Greater Favored Enemy: Aberrations
aberrations.description:
The bonuses I get from Favored Enemy now also work against aberrations
   Additionally, I have advantage on saves against spells and abilities used by aberrations

celestials.name: Greater Favored Enemy: Celestials
celestials.description:
The bonuses I get from Favored Enemy now also work against celestials
   Additionally, I have advantage on saves against spells and abilities used by celestials

constructs.name: Greater Favored Enemy: Constructs
constructs.description:
The bonuses I get from Favored Enemy now also work against constructs
   Additionally, I have advantage on saves against spells and abilities used by constructs

dragons.name: Greater Favored Enemy: Dragons
dragons.description:
The bonuses I get from Favored Enemy now also work against dragons
   Additionally, I have advantage on saves against spells and abilities used by dragons

elementals.name: Greater Favored Enemy: Elementals
elementals.description:
The bonuses I get from Favored Enemy now also work against elementals
   Additionally, I have advantage on saves against spells and abilities used by elementals

fiends.name: Greater Favored Enemy: Fiends
fiends.description:
The bonuses I get from Favored Enemy now also work against fiends
   Additionally, I have advantage on saves against spells and abilities used by fiends

giants.name: Greater Favored Enemy: Giants
giants.description:
The bonuses I get from Favored Enemy now also work against giants
   Additionally, I have advantage on saves against spells and abilities used by giants

fleet of foot.name: Fleet of Foot
fleet of foot.description: I can take the Dash action as a bonus action

hide in plain sight.name: Hide in Plain Sight
hide in plain sight.description:
When I hide on my turn without moving, others take -10 Wis (Perception) to find me
   This lasts until something reveals my presence, or until I (voluntarily) move/fall prone

vanish.name: Vanish
vanish.description: I can't be nonmagically tracked if I don't want to be and can Hide as a bonus action

feral senses.name: Feral Senses
feral senses.description:
When not blinded or deafened, I'm aware of invisible, non-hidden creatures in 30 ft
   I don't have disadvantage when attacking creatures I am aware of but can't see

foe slayer.name: Foe Slayer
foe slayer.description: Once per turn, I can add Wis mod to the attack or damage roll after I see the die roll

name: Mystic

skillstxt.primary: Choose two from Arcana, History, Insight, Medicine, Nature, Perception, and Religion

psi points.name: Psi Points
psi points.description: I use psi points to fuel my psionic disciplines, up to my psi limit per instance

psionics.name: Psionics
psionics.description: I can use psionic talents/disciplines that I know, using Intelligence as my psionic ability

psychic focus.name: Psychic Focus
psychic focus.description:
As a bonus action, I can choose one of my psionic disciplines and gain its focus benefit
   I can only focus on one at a time; It stays until I focus on another, or I'm incapacitated

subclassfeature1.name: Mystic Order
subclassfeature1.description: Choose a Mystic Order that shapes the nature of your rage and put it in the "Class" field

mystical recovery.name: Mystical Recovery
mystical recovery.description: As a bonus action after using psi points on a discipline, I can regain HP per point spent

telepathy.name: Telepathy
telepathy.description: I can telepathically speak to creatures I can see within 120 ft, if they know a language

strength of mind.name: Strength of Mind
strength of mind.description: After a short rest, I can change my Wisdom save proficiency to another ability score

potent psionics.name: Potent Psionics
potent psionics.description:
Once per turn, when I hit a creature with a weapon attack, I can do extra damage
   In addition, I add my Intelligence modifier to my psionic talent damage rolls

atkAdd.body: function(e,a){classes.known.mystic&&7<classes.known.mystic.level&&!a.isSpell&&(e.Description+=(e.Description?"; ":"")+"Once per turn +"+(classes.known.mystic.level<14?1:2)+"d8 psychic damage")}

atkAdd:
Once per turn, I can have one of my weapon attacks that hit do extra psychic damage.
 • My psionic talents get my Intelligence modifier added to their damage roll.

atkCalc.body: function(e,a,t){classes.known.mystic&&7<classes.known.mystic.level&&a.thisWeapon[3]&&-1!==a.thisWeapon[4].indexOf("mystic")&&0===SpellsList[a.thisWeapon[3]].level&&(t.extraDmg+=What("Int Mod"))}

spellAdd.body: function(e,a,t){if(a.psionic&&0==a.level)return genericSpellDmgEdit(e,a,"\\w+|Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder","Int",!0)}

spellAdd: My psionic talents get my Intelligence modifier added to their damage.

consumptive power.name: Consumptive Power
consumptive power.description:
Once per long rest, I can use my HP to fuel a psionic discipline instead of psi points
   I lose the HP; My HP max is reduced with the same until I finish my next long rest

psionic mastery.name: Psionic Mastery
psionic mastery.description:
As an action, I can gain a pool of special psi points that last until I finish a long rest
   I can use these, without psi limit, for disciplines that require an action or bonus action
   I can use either these or psi points from my normal pool for a discipline, but not both
   I can concentrate on all disciplines that use these special points at the same time
   I lose concentration if I cast a discipline requiring concentration from my normal pool

psionic body.name: Psionic Body
psionic body.description:
I no longer age and I have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
   I'm immune to disease, poison damage, and the poisoned condition
   If I die, I have a 55% chance of discorporating instead and returning 1d3 days later
